name: Fruit Fall!
description:
Fruit Fall is a short little minigame made in a few days for a Game Programming Design Principles course. Controls:
  • <- and -> (recommended) or A and D to move
  • Q W and E to change color
    • Q - red
    • W - orange
    • E - yellow
Credits:
  • Design, Programming, and Art - toadletgames
  • Royalty Free Music - 8 Bit Menu by David Renda
  • Royalty Free Sound Effects - Collect Diamond : Negative Beeps by themusicalnomad : Tadaa
  • Font - Kiwi Soda by jeti
